segments.script: "Good morning, Appalachians! This is Julie from your friendly neighborhood radio station. It's 8:00 now - a brand new day full of possibilities out there! I'm just happy to be here, playing tunes for you as the sun rises over these beautiful hills we call home. If you're listening and feeling the morning energy, I say let's make today count! Welcome home, Appalachia."
